Class Mouse

java.lang.Object
com.codeforall.simplegraphics.mouse.Mouse
All Implemented Interfaces:
MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, EventListener
public class Mouse extends Object implements MouseListener, MouseMotionListener
Instantiate a Mouse for obtaining mouse handling capability
